p: OAD design and statistical analysis: for single factor experiment results, OAD was used to acquire the optimal SF-CO 2 extraction conditions. Extraction pressure (A), temperature (B), time (C) and particle size (D) as four factors for three levels. Using an L 9 (3 4) orthogonal experimental design, investigated the influence of these factors on the EDS oil extraction yield obtained by SF-CO 2 extraction.
